title: Intensive Short-Term Course for Mobile-Assisted Scientific English Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific terminology and experience in research report writing
context.additional_context: A hands-on environment emphasizing scenarios for international academic conference presentations and research paper writing.

learning_goals: Learners can use context-specific scientific English terminology with at least 80% accuracy during presentations in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can revise a draft science report incorporating peer feedback at least three times using a mobile app.
Learners can successfully complete at least four work-coordination dialogues with international peers in simulation-based role-play.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
